## daf-ethr-did package

Provides `did:ethr` [identity provider](./daf-ethr-did.ethridentityprovider.md) for the [IdentityManager](./daf-identity-manager.identitymanager.md)

## Classes

| Class                                                          | Description                                                                                                         |
| -------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [EthrIdentityProvider](./daf-ethr-did.ethridentityprovider.md) | [IdentityManager](./daf-identity-manager.identitymanager.md) identity provider for <code>did:ethr</code> identities |
